name:
Mario & Luigi™:
Dream Team Bros. Update
formal_name:
Mario & Luigi™:
Dream Team Bros. Update
description:
An update for Mario & Luigi™: Dream Team Bros. is now available from Nintendo eShop. This will update the software to Version 1.1.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
